QuestData.Title: Knowing is Half the Battle
QuestData.Description:
$n, you should join Shandris and infiltrate the Mawsworn forces from the east. Whatever information you two uncover will inform us of your next course of action.
Take care. We have no information on what you may find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Shandris near the Provis Strata.
QuestData.RewardText:
You've arrived.
Their movements here are strange. It almost seems as if the bulk of their forces are elsewhere.
